entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
